tool_description: All kids of global Climate news are there published in Bangladeshi newspaper
name: Climate News For Bangladesh Newspaper
title: Climate News For Bangladesh Newspaper

api_list.name: Get all Climate news from Bangladesh
api_list.description: We get all the climate news from the Bangladesh newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-for-bangladesh-newspaper.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-for-bangladesh-newspaper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-for-bangladesh-newspaper.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-for-bangladesh-newspaper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
